recipesJson.name: Renaissance Faire Custard
recipesJson.author: TorturedZen
recipesJson.description: Another custatd iteration. This one makes use of CAPs Funnel cake to add the perception of thickness. As a complimentary note I added Choc Coconut Almond which has a nice twist to thr custard. No shake & vape here. Give the custard it's due and let it age...1 week minimum.
